data.name: Paradise Homeland
data.detailed_description:
Paradise Homeland focuses is a open world, sandbox experience like no other, prepare to have the weight of the stressful world lifted off your shoulder!
FEATURES:
Open world ~ Explore the diverse open world filled with secrets, Easter eggs, and more hidden details, waiting for you!

Radio ~
Listen to some of our carefully curated songs, or possibly listen to your own music for free!

Pets ~
Adopt a pet, make them your companion who will follow you along on your adventure.


Hunger and Thirst
Be careful to make sure you are well fed and not thirsty, as being out in Paradise Homeland can become very straining.

Paradise Homeland Awaits Your Arrival!

Paradise Homeland Awaits Your Arrival!
data.short_description: Explore the scenic, sandbox experience, where you can build anything you can imagine, move to the large, open land of Paradise Homeland!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3240
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Not Needed
  • Additional Notes: Not Fully Tested
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 Pro
  • Processor: Intel core i5 10900
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 3070ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended
  • Additional Notes: Not fully tested

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
